verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- The word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came unto me again saying

מַה־ <WH4100> mah- What לָּכֶ֗ם la-Chem, אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> 'at-Tem you מֹֽשְׁלִים֙ <WH4911> mo-she-Lim What mean ye that ye use אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמָּשָׁ֣ל <WH4912> ham-ma-Shal this proverb הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, this עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- concerning אַדְמַ֥ת <WH127> 'ad-Mat concerning the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying אָבוֹת֙ <WH1> a-Vot The fathers יֹ֣אכְלוּ <WH398> Yo-che-lu have eaten בֹ֔סֶר <WH1155> Vo-ser, sour grapes וְשִׁנֵּ֥י <WH8127> ve-shin-Nei teeth הַבָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> hab-ba-Nim and the children's תִּקְהֶֽינָה׃ <WH6949> tik-Hei-nah. are set on edge

הֵ֤ן <WH2005> hen Behold כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַנְּפָשׁוֹת֙ <WH5315> han-ne-fa-shOt Behold all souls לִ֣י li הֵ֔נָּה <WH2007> Hen-nah, in כְּנֶ֧פֶשׁ <WH5315> ke-Ne-fesh are mine as the soul הָאָ֛ב <WH1> ha-'Av of the father וּכְנֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> u-che-Ne-fesh so also the soul הַבֵּ֖ן <WH1121> hab-Ben of the son לִי־ li- הֵ֑נָּה <WH2007> Hen-nah; in הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> han-Ne-fesh is mine the soul הַחֹטֵ֖את <WH2398> ha-cho-Tet that sinneth הִ֥יא <WH1931> hi he תָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> ta-Mut. it shall die ס sa-Mek
